text:
LXXVIII. A Catalogue of the Fifty Plants from Chelsea Garden, presented to the Royal Society by the worshipful Company of Apothecaries, for the Year 1761, pursuant to the Direction of Sir Hans Sloane, Baronet, Med. Reg. et Soc. Reg. nuper Praeses; by John Wilmer, M. D. clariss. Societatis Pharmaceut. Lond. Soc. Hort. Chelsean. Praefectus et Praelector. Botanic.

Read March 25, 1762.

1951 Nemone caule dichotomo, foliis superioribus sessilibus amplexi caulibus palmatis.

1952 Asarum Americanum majus. H. R. Par. Officin. 55.

1953 Ascyrum Balearicum frutescens, maximo flore luteo, foliis minoribus, subtus verrucosis. Salvadore.

1954 Aster foliis linearibus fasciculatis punctatis pedunculis unifloris nudis, caule fruticoso rugoso. Hort. Cliff.

1955 Bignonia Urucu foliis amplissimis, Caroliniana. D. Catesby, Catalpa.

1956 Bulbocastanum. J. B. 3. 2. 30. maj. fol. Apii. C. B. P. 162.

1957 Bupleurum involucellis pentaphyllis acutis, universali triphylllo, flosculo centrali altiore, ramis divaricatis. Linn. Sp. 237.

1958 Cardamine Alpina trifoliata. Cluf. Hist. 127.
Nasturtium Alpinum trifolium. C. B. P. 104.

1959 Cardamine. 201.
Nasturtium pratens. maj. Park. Offic. 103.

1960 Cataria angustifolia major. Tourn. Inst. 202.
1961 Centaurium minus. C. B. P. 278. Offic. 117.
1962 Crategus foliis cordato-ovatis ferratis subtus tomentosis, floribus paniculatis.

1963 Cynosurus spicis quaternis obtufis dimidiatis calycibus mucronatis. Linn. Sp. Pl. 72.
1964 Diospyrus foliorum paginis discoloribus. Linn. Sp. Pl. 1057. Miller's Icons.

1965 Epilobium foliis lanceolatis alternis capsulis quadrangulis.
1966 Gladiolus foliis linearibus, caule ramoso. Linn. Syst. 863.
1967 Gloriosa Linnæi.
Methonica gloriosa, foliis capreolatis, floribus fimbriatis, reflexis. Burman. Zeyl. 158.
Lilium Zeylanicum superbum. H. Amst. 1. p. 69. Tab. 35.

1968 Hyacinthus corollis irregularibus sexpartitis. Linn. Sp. 313.
1969 Jacea marina Boetica. Park 473.
1970 Impatiens pedunculis unifloris, foliis ovato-lanceolatis, geniculis caulini tumentibus.

1971 Itea Linnæi.
1972 Ixia foliis lanceolatis nervosis pubescentibus, scapo trifloris.
1973 Ixia foliis lineari gladiolatis, floribus alaribus et terminalibus. Miller's Icons, Tab. 155. Fig. 2.
1974 Lactuca sylvestris minima. Ray. Synop. 3. 162.

Chondrilla
Chondrilla viscosa humilis. C. B. Pin. 130.

1975 Lantana foliis oppositis subseffilibus floribus racemosis. Linn. Syst. 1116.

1976 Linum perenne majus caeruleum capitulo magiore. Hist. Ox. 2. 573.

1977 Lobelia caulibus procumbentibus, foliis lanceolatis serratis, pedunculis lateralibus. Hort. Cliff. 426.

1978 Lychnis caule erecto, calycibus striatis acutis petalis disjectis. Miller's Icons.

1979 Oxys flore albo. Tourn. 88. Lujula Offic. 291.

1980 Paliurus. Ray, 154. Dodonæi, 756.

1981 Phlomis involucris lanceolatis, foliis cordatis tomentosis, caule subfruticoso. Miller's Dict.

1982 Phlomis involucris lanceolatis, foliis ovatis subtus tomentosis. Linn. Sp. 585.

1983 Ribes nigrum vulgo dictum, folio olente. J. B. 2. 98.

1984 Robinia foliis impari-pinnatis, foliolis ovatis, ramis pedunculisque hispidis. Dict. Hort.

1985 Sambucus cymis quinque partitis, foliis sub-bipinnatis. Linn. Sp. Pl. 269.

1986 Saxifraga aurea. Ger. 693.

Rotundifol. aurea, C. B. P. 309.

1987 Scabiosa corollulis trifidis, foliis caulinis tripinnatis filiformibus. Sauvage Monsp. 268.

1988 Scabiosa corollulis quinquefidis, foliis lineari-lanceolatis integerrimis, caule herbaceo. Linn. Cent. 15.

1989 Scabiosa folio integro hirsuto. Tourn. 466. Offic. 475.
1990 Scabiosa pratensis hirsuta, quae officinarum. C. B. 269. Officin. 134.

1991 Solanum caule herbaceo erecto inermi, foliis ovato-lanceolatis angulo dentatis, floribus lateralibus. Miller's Dict.

1992 Smyrnium foliis caulini ternatis petiolatis, foliolis oblongo-ovatis integerrimis. Flor. Virgin.

1993 Trifolium spicis subvillosis, lacinia calycum infima maxima, caule fruticoso, foliis sub-sessilibus. Linn. Spec. 770.

1994 Tragacantha. Tourn. 417. Massiliensis. J. B. 1. 407.

1995 Tusfilago vulgaris. C. B. 197. Offic. 495.

1996 Viola caule unifloro, foliis cordatis dentatis. Linn. Spec. 936.

1997 Viola montana lutea grandiflora nostras. Ray. Synop. 3. 365.

1998 Warneria. Miller's Icons.

1999 Watsonia. Miller's Icons.

2000 Zygophyllum capsulis ovatis acutis. Linn. Spec. Plant. 386.

Fabago flore luteo, petalorum unguibus rubris, fructu sulcato acuto oblongo. Burman. Plant. Afric. 6.

LXXIX. An
